biocontainers.name: neatms
biocontainers.summary: Neatms is an open source python package for untargeted lcms signal labelling and filtering

biotools.summary: NeatMS is an open source python package for untargeted LCMS signal labelling and filtering. NeatMS enables automated filtering of false positive MS peaks reported by commonly used LCMS data processing pipelines. NeatMS relies on neural network based classification.

bioschemas.name: NeatMS
bioschemas.summary: NeatMS is an open source python package for untargeted LCMS signal labelling and filtering. NeatMS enables automated filtering of false positive MS peaks reported by commonly used LCMS data processing pipelines. NeatMS relies on neural network based classification.
